name: Crystal Jump
description:
This game was made using the Construct 2 Engine and is a simple platformer where you need to collect crystals. The game has 23 levels, each next one gives you a new challenge! Test the game and be sure to tell your opinion about it

This is the first game that the developer created. All bugs will be fixed soon, the game will be updated!
--------
Current version: 0.0.2 Alpha

Updates:
0.0.1 - First version!
0.0.2 - added a new interface

--------

Control:

“A” – Move Left

“D” – Move Right

“Space” - Jump

“E” – Next Level

“R” – Restart position

---------

! - Attention - !

The exit button does not work, as Construct 2 does not allow it, the developer is trying to solve this problem. You can close the game by first collapsing it. Sorry for the inconvenience

If you find errors, be sure to report them to the developer by email, please :)

Email: shish.zh@yandex.ru
Be fun!
